be.belgium.eid.objects
Class IDPIN

java.lang.Object
  be.belgium.eid.objects.IDPIN

public class IDPIN
extends java.lang.Object

The IDPIN class contains the information of a PIN, there are 1 or more on the beID card.

Version:
1.0.0 13 Dec 2007
Author:
Kristof Overdulve

Constructor Summary
IDPIN(PINType pinType, char id, PINUsageCode usageCode, int flags, java.lang.String label)
          Creates a new PIN object from a smart card, initializing it with the given data.
 
Method Summary
 int getFlags()
          Returns the flags of the current PIN.
 char getID()
          Returns the reference or ID of the PIN.

          Returns the label that comes with the PIN to explain more about it's type.

          Returns the type of PIN on the card.

Constructor Detail

IDPIN

public IDPIN(PINType pinType,
             char id,
             PINUsageCode usageCode,
             int flags,
             java.lang.String label)
Creates a new PIN object from a smart card, initializing it with the given data.

Parameters:
pinType - is the type of PIN on the card
id - is the reference or ID of the PIN
usageCode - is the usage code for the PIN
flags - are the flags for the current PIN
label - is the label that comes with the PIN to explain more about it's type
